content: Investigators who conducted an inspection in China to determine origins of the COVID-19 virus will release a report on their findings in mid-March, a World Health Organization official said Friday.
translations: ita:Gli investigatori che hanno condotto un'ispezione in Cina per determinare le origini del virus COVID-19 rilasceranno un
